about_the_game: Independent strategy video game created by Jan Zelený. The combination of procedurally generated challenges, realistic graphics and board-game-like straightforward rules. It is a challenging business simulation game with everything around cargo delivery. The player acts as a entrepreneur in control of a transport company. He needs to lay tracks, roads and airports on a difficult terrain, invent and buy new vehicles, project routes and compete against economical rules to make as much profit by transporting passengers and various cargo types as possible to progress to another historical era.

name: Mashinky Demo
short_description: Demo of Mashinky - a transport strategy game about trains. The goal is to create your own transport empire on a procedurally generated map. It’s a unique blend of realistic graphics combined with an isometric construction mode and board game-like rules.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Czech, Greek
